title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather detailed project requirements for the NanoMedBot, including functional and non-functional specifications.

title: Design the NanoMedBot Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the NanoMedBot, including hardware and software components, communication protocols, and power source.

title: Develop the Ingestion Mechanism
description: Design and implement a safe and reliable ingestion mechanism for the NanoMedBot.

title: Create Cellular Navigation Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms for the NanoMedBot to navigate and patrol the body efficiently.

title: Implement Disease Detection Capabilities
description: Develop algorithms for the NanoMedBot to detect diseases at a cellular level.

title: Design User Interface for Control and Monitoring
description: Create a user interface for controlling and monitoring the NanoMedBot, including visualization of its location and status.

title: Develop Treatment Delivery Mechanisms
description: Design and implement mechanisms for the NanoMedBot to deliver treatments once diseases are detected.

title: Test the NanoMedBot Components
description: Perform unit and integration tests on each component of the NanoMedBot to ensure proper functioning.
dependencies: Design User Interface for Control and Monitoring

title: Perform System-level Integration Testing
description: Conduct system-level tests on the fully integrated NanoMedBot, verifying correct functionality and performance.

title: Review Design and Implementation Documentation
description: Review all design and implementation documentation to ensure adherence to project requirements, best practices, and industry standards.
dependencies: Design User Interface for Control and Monitoring

title: Prepare Regulatory Compliance Documentation
description: Create documentation to demonstrate compliance with relevant regulatory requirements for the NanoMedBot.

title: Deploy the NanoMedBot for Clinical Trials
description: Plan, coordinate, and execute deployment of the NanoMedBot for clinical trials under medical supervision.
